_REQUEST Struct Reference
[HTTP, HTTP]

#include <pro/httpd.h>

Detailed Description

HTTP request information structure.
Examples:

httpd/httpserv.c.


Data Fields

int req_method
 Request method.
int req_version
 11 = HTTP/1.1, 10 = HTTP/1.0, 9 = HTTP/0.9
int req_length
 Content length.
char * req_url
 URI portion of the GET or POST request line.
char * req_query
 Argument string.
char * req_type
 Content type.
char * req_cookie
 Cookie.
char * req_auth
 Authorization info.
char * req_agent
 User agent.
char ** req_qptrs
 Table of request parameters.
int req_numqptrs
 Number of request parameters.
